articles.title: How to live longer: The best exercise for increasing life longevity - what is it? - Express
articles.description: HOW TO live longer: Much emphasis is placed on what a person eats when it comes to living a longer and healthier life. However, new research has indicated a particular type of exercise which puts the body under the right kind of stress can help a person live …
articles.content:
What is high-intensity interval training (HIIT)
